sentence: Gibbs’ expected primary opponent is Max Miller, a former aide to Donald Trump.

title: Ohio Republican announces retirement over redistricting

sentence: Trump initially supported former aide Max Miller in the 16th District to challenge Rep. Anthony Gonzalez, R-Ohio, voted to impeach Trump in the wake of the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the Capitol.

sentence: The six-term congressman from Amish Country exits a primary race in northeast Ohio that, under new temporary maps, would have put him up against Trump-backed Republican Max Miller.

title: Ohio Rep. Bob Gibbs retires abruptly, blames fight over maps

sentence: But Gibbs' most significant obstacle to a seventh term was former Trump White House and campaign aide Max Miller, one of several other candidates who filed for the May 3 primary.
title: Rep. Bob Gibbs of Ohio, facing Trump-backed challenger, announces retirement

sentence: To that end, after considerable deliberation, I have decided to not seek re-election this year.” Gibbs was also facing Max Miller, a former aide to former President Donald Trump, in the Republican primary.
